languages.text: "Да, Ваша Светлость. И на этот раз речь пойдет об основной причине моего присутствия на этой планете — ксеносах и угрозе, что они представляют и для вас, и для Человечества в целом".

traits.locale_text: "Да, Ваше Сиятельство. И на этот раз речь пойдет об основной причине моего присутствия на этой планете — ксеносах и угрозе, что они представляют и для вас, и для Человечества в целом".

languages.text: "There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."
languages.original_text: "Да, Ваша Светлость. И на этот раз речь пойдет об основной причине моего присутствия на этой планете — ксеносах и угрозе, что они представляют и для вас, и для Человечества в целом".

traits.locale_text: "There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat that they pose both for you and for humanity as a whole."
"There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat that they pose both for you and for humanity as a whole."
"There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."
"There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."
"There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."

languages.text: “确实有，大人，而且这件事情正是我出现在这颗行星的主要原因。我指的是异形，以及他们对您与整个人类种族构成的威胁。”
languages.original_text: "There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."

traits.locale_text: “确实有，大人，而且这件事情正是我出现在这颗行星的主要原因。我指的是异形，以及他们对您与整个人类种族构成的威胁。”

languages.text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esta vez se trata de la principal razón de mi presencia en este planeta: los xenos y la amenaza que suponen para usted y para toda la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esta vez se trata de la principal razón de mi presencia en este planeta: los xenos y la amenaza que suponen para usted y para toda la Humanidad».

languages.text: 「ございます、陛下。今回、私がこの星にいる主な理由は―異種族とそれに伴う脅威です。陛下と人類全体のどちらにとっても厄介な連中です」
languages.original_text: "There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."

traits.locale_text: 「ございます、陛下。今回、私がこの星にいる主な理由は―異種族とそれに伴う脅威です。陛下と人類全体のどちらにとっても厄介な連中です」

languages.text: "In der Tat, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Und dabei geht es um den Hauptgrund meiner Anwesenheit auf diesem Planeten – die Xenos und ihre Bedrohung für Euch und die gesamte Menschheit."
languages.original_text: "There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Und dabei geht es um den Hauptgrund meiner Anwesenheit auf diesem Planeten – die Xenos und ihre Bedrohung für Euch und die gesamte Menschheit."

languages.text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Cela concerne la raison de ma présence sur cette planète : les xénos et la menace qu'ils représentent aussi bien pour vous que pour l'humanité tout entière. »
languages.original_text: "There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Cela concerne la raison de ma présence sur cette planète : les xénos et la menace qu'ils représentent aussi bien pour vous que pour l'humanité tout entière. »

languages.text: "Evet, var {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu gezegende bulunma sebebimle, zenolar ve onların size ve genel olarak İnsanlığa teşkil ettikleri tehditle ilgili diyeceklerim var."
languages.original_text: "There was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And this time, it concerns the main reason for my presence on this planet — xenos and the threat they pose both to you and to Humanity as a whole."

traits.locale_text: "Evet vardı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu gezegende bulunma sebebimle ilgili: Zenolar ve onların size ve genel olarak İnsanlığa teşkil ettikleri tehdit."
